page.title: 05RECIPES FROM ABERDEEN.
page.content: ABERDEEN SAUSAGE. 1 lb sausage meat 1 lb minced steak 1 tbps Worcestershire sauce 4 oz minced bacon salt and pepper 8 oz fresh white breadcrumbs 1 egg beaten breadcrumbs for coating { Mix all ingredients, except last two. {Bind with beaten egg. Make into a {roll.Boil in a floured cloth for 90 {mins.Roll in breadcrumbs,toasted in {oven.Serve cold with salad.Serves 6.} BUTTERIES 1tsp sugar 1tsp salt 1 oz yeast 1lb flour 2 oz lard 1/2 pt water/milk {Sift flour into warm bowl.Mix in salt. {Rub in lard.Cream yeast & sugar with {wooden spoon till liquid. Strain into {flour.Add milk liquid to make a soft {dough.Cover & set to rise for 1hr in {warm place.Knead lighty,divide into } {equal sizes.Brush with milk & water. {Leave for 15mins.(425F)for 15-20mins.
